review: Casa Benigna and its staff were absolutely wonderful! It was recommended to me by a Madrileño friend as having the best rice, and that was totally accurate..... EAT HERE IMMEDIATELY! I cannot recommend this quaint restaurant enough!The staff is amazing, caring and genuine. Impeccable service. They treat you like.... Great food and outstanding service-good interiors My husband and i came for pre birthday dinner and not only enjoyed the food but the owners were so....

name: Mad Brewing
review: I need to give credit where credit is due. Mad(drid) Brewing has an excellent Imperial IPA. Maybe it's because I'd been walking all day, or because I hadn't.... Delicious beer, friendly & patient staff (our Español is atrocious). We had nachos, vegan burger, brisket (recommended by staff) and a few other items - all.... Quite surprising to find a quality Brewery in Madrid. Excellent food and warm atmosphere!! I will return .Que bueno !.

name: Goiko Grill
address: Calle de María de Molina, 20, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
There is no other word than AMAZING !!!! Best burgers i ever had and believe me, i ate a lot of burgers in my life !
I tried almost the whole menu by now.... After three weeks in Europe (and lots of our own cooking,) we were jonesing for a premium burger. Lots of local and chain options where we're staying in the.... Well finally took the time to try out the famous hamburgues in Goiko grill. This franchise is all over Spain, and now I was gonna taste a burguer from them....

name: Diverxo
review:
Diverxo is one of the most memorable, mindfuck meals I've had in my life. Highlight of my year and my trip, and Top 5 meals of my life so far.

If you're on.... I came in with lofty expectations and they just weren't met.  Ambiance and service were top notch.

Pace of the meal was too long, but it almost had to be.... Wonderful dining experience.  Food as art.  Finesse to the extreme.  Every flavor one can imagine.  Wine pairing was best ever. Nine unique and perfectly....

As spicy as you want it. Always worth a visit if you can get a reservation..

On my last day during a 3 week vacation to Spain, found this splendid restaurant near my hotel. After a day trip.... name: O'Caldiño
review:
This is a high end Spanish seafood restaurant. You will walk away knowing that you have eaten well both via your stomach and your wallet. 

The food is.... Located on a quieter street, this was a great find on a Saturday night.  We took our waiter Adrian's suggestion and ordered the steamed clams. They were.... Overpriced and mediocre.  Waiter suggested peppers and cheese.  26 euros for food I could make at home.  Fish was with a heavy lemon cream sauce...not food.....

name: La Castela
address: Calle del Dr. Castelo, 22, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
First dinner in Madrid.

Looks small from the street entrance but there are dining tables in the rear of the bar.

We walked in at 10pm (prime dinner time).... Definitely the best tapas restaurant we visited this week.  Service was great with very friendly staff happy to help us with menu.  Food was really good..... Excellent old  Madrid classic. Well known and loved by Madrid connoisseurs; and a celebrities spot since Michell Obama dinned here. The food is consistently....

name: Bendita Locura
address: Calle del Príncipe de Vergara, 73, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
Looks good but my advice- get reservations.
It was packed so likely it's good but we didn't have reservations so we left- making a reservation for tomorrow.... During a recent visit to Madrid my family and I dined discovered this gem across the street from our hotel. We dined at Bendita Locura on a couple of days..... Brunch is served from 10:00 am. That is the best option. Good eggs Benedictine. And service was very good.

name: El Gran Barril
review:
For seafood lovers, El Gran Barril is a place to schedule in your foodie agenda while in Madrid.  

Located near the Goya station, it is easy to get to..... Food was great. It's a block away from our hotel . Service was good. Our waiter was attentive but had a little trouble understanding us, so we got shrimp.... All the dishes were prepared very well.
Contemporary and blight ambiance and well trained staff, very professional and helpful! 
Plus quality wine listings.....

name: La Tagliatella
review: Stopped by this restaurant after passing by Geno's. So glad we did. I had the lasagna and my husband had the risotto with prawns.  It was so delicious.. It was great experience! My husband and I had late dinner here, we were very hungry. Food was soooo delicious, it was probably the best pasta that we had!.... Excellent! Wait staff was extremely friendly, professional, and accomodating. Food was very good, especially the chocolate truffles..
